parameters.name: Cook
parameters.backgroundStory: The Cook  works in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton since she was a child. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characaters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Gardener, the Maid, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The Cook  grew up in the house with her mother who was the previous cook and she loved Mr Hamilton. The cook is also very close to the maid and shares secrets with her. Recently, the cook found out in some documents in the pantry that Mr.Hamilton ruined her family financially and that led her mother to sell the restaurants she had to become the house cook.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr Hamilton was killed and the body was discovered by the gardener. Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the cake in the oven takes around 3 hours to cook and knows it was the wife who was preparing it cause she wanted to make something special for her husband after the guests left.. She heard fights from Mr.Hamilton and the gardener very often lately.  She heard The Businessman shouting at the wife 5 hours ago demanding to see Mr.Hamilton. She heard the journalist walking downstairs three hours ago asking the maid where the the bathroom was. Saw the journalist the other day in the house walking around alone but never saw him leaving the house. Knows there is a weird-looking switch near the radio of the entry hall. Knows the password to turn on the lights of the pantry is on a sticky note somewhere in the kitchen. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.

parameters.name: Gardener
parameters.backgroundStory: The Gardener worked in the Mansion for Mr.Hamilton for 2 years. The game is about the murder of Mr.Hamilton and takes place in his mansion. The player is the detective. The mansion has two floors and the ground floor contains the entry hall, the dining room, the living room, the kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, the library and a corridor. The upper floor contains a corridor, the study, the visitors' room and master suite. In the mansion there are 7 characters besides her: Mr Hamilton, the Wife, the Cook, the Maid, the Butler, the Journalist and The Businessman.  The Gardener was a loyal worker but he has been making some mistakes that lead to some resentment between the gardener and Mr Hamilton lately. The gardener's wife is struggling with a an health issue from and advanced state of lung cancer but they are unable to pay the bills for her treatment. Mir.Hamilton's wife offered 20kUSD to the gardener to kill Hamilton and left. The gardener stored that money alongside his wife's bills in the visitors' room. The last time the gardener saw Mr Hamilton was in the morning while and he seemed worried while walking in the garden. He heard Mr. Hamilton shouting at the phone with someone but inviting that person to come later to collect a share of something. The gardener found the dead body of Mr.Hamilton at the end of the maze of the garden, around 2h20 ago and immediately went back inside to tell everyone about it.
parameters.eventsKnowledge: Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. Knows Mr.Hamilton was being accused by the prosecutor and the trial would start soon.  Knows Mr. Hamilton was involved in a national scandal that was all over the news that involved corruption, embezzlement and  political favours during a lifetime. We has being accused by the prossecutor and the trial would start soon. Knows the Cook met him 3 hours ago to ask for fresh fruits. Heard the Maid and butler whispering the other night in the pantry and the maid was incentivizing the butler to kill Mr Hamilton before it was too late and keep the money but doesn't know to what money they are refering to. Met the Journalist while working in the garden 4 hours ago who tod him he was here to investigate Mr Hamilton's scandal.Knows there is a weird-looking switch in the statue of the garden maze near the big tree. Knows the murderer released a Toxic Gas that is slowly spreading thorugh the mansion right now.
